entity_types.name: Company
entity_types.description: The electric vehicle and clean energy company Tesla Inc.

properties.mission: To accelerate the world's transition to sustainable energy

entity_types.name: Industry
entity_types.description: The automotive and energy industries impacted by Tesla

properties.change: accelerating the transition to electric vehicles and sustainable energy

relation_groups.name: Company History
relation_groups.description: The founding and evolution of Tesla Inc.

relations.name: Founded
relations.description: Tesla Inc. was founded in 2003 by engineers Martin Eberhard and Marc Tarpenning
relations.detail: The company was named after inventor Nikola Tesla and is headquartered in Austin, Texas.

relations.name: Leadership
relations.description: Elon Musk joined Tesla in 2004 as chairman and became CEO in 2008, leading the company through its most transformative period
relations.detail: Musk's vision, risk-taking, and ability to attract talent have been crucial to Tesla's success.

relation_groups.name: Product Development
relation_groups.description: Tesla's electric vehicle lineup and technological innovations

relations.name: Introduced
relations.description: Tesla introduced various electric vehicle models over time
relations.detail: The Tesla Roadster (2008), Model S (2012), Model X (2015), Model 3 (2017), and Model Y (2020) were launched to address different vehicle segments.

relations.name: Technological Innovations
relations.description: Tesla has developed advanced technologies to improve its vehicles and support EV adoption
relations.detail: This includes the Autopilot system, Full Self-Driving capabilities, the Supercharger network, and the Powerwall energy storage system.

relation_groups.name: Manufacturing and Sustainability
relation_groups.description: Tesla's approach to manufacturing and environmental impact

relations.name: Sustainable Manufacturing
relations.description: Tesla aims to use renewable energy for its manufacturing operations
relations.detail: The company's Gigafactories are designed to be net-zero energy facilities, incorporating solar panels and other renewable energy sources.

relations.name: Environmental Impact
relations.description: Tesla's electric vehicles and sustainable energy products have a positive impact on the environment
relations.detail: By producing electric vehicles, Tesla has helped reduce greenhouse gas emissions from transportation, one of the largest sources of global emissions.

relation_groups.name: Industry Transformation
relation_groups.description: Tesla's influence on the automotive and energy industries

relations.name: Industry Disruption
relations.description: Tesla has accelerated the transition to electric vehicles and sustainable energy
relations.detail: The company's success has demonstrated that electric vehicles can be desirable, high-performance, and profitable, fundamentally changing the trajectory of the automotive industry.

relations.name: Inspiring Innovation
relations.description: Tesla has inspired numerous startups and established companies to invest in electric vehicles and clean energy technologies
relations.detail: The company has demonstrated that sustainable technology can be both profitable and transformative, creating a new paradigm for the automotive and energy industries.
